name: Project Island (OrcoExotico)
description:
You will get into the skin of a boy lost on an island that something has happened and he has to discover what. You have to be careful because there are enemies that you can't kill, but if they get too close, you will die.

In order to survive you must discover what happened by searching for clues in the temples ruins.

Controls:

Player MovementW, A, S, DSprintLeft ShiftJumpSpace BarCrouchLeft ControlInteract With ObjectsLeft Click
